title: The new Roku does 4K and finds the remote for you
text:
The new Roku does 4K and finds the remote for you 
Published By: Tuaw.com - Today 
It's clearly video-streaming box season. Apple finally dropped an updated Apple TV, the Chromecast got all colorful and the Fire TV upped it... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
